name: Psychology Supervisor
description: Analyzes psychological and cognitive science research for behavioral and mental process insights

skills.name: Psychology and Cognitive Science Analysis
skills.description: Analyzes psychological research, cognitive science, and behavioral studies for cross-domain insights
examples: Analyze cognitive bias research for AI system design implications
Synthesize social psychology findings with technology adoption patterns
Evaluate decision-making research for economic and policy applications

specializations: Clinical psychology and mental health research
